choices.name: Choice_3rdPartyErrorOnFile
choices.choiceText: Third Party Error On File (Errors from Case Verification Intakes caused by Vendors)

choices.name: Choice_ClientForm
choices.choiceText: Client Form (Section of Clients Personal Information)

choices.name: Choice_ErrorOnFile
choices.choiceText: Error On File (Errors Caused by our Internal Teams)

decisions.description: Determines if a packet should be created or not.
decisions.name: Decision_3
decisions.label: Referral Pack Creation Routing

Flow.description: This flow manages all of the QC workflow for processing all intakes that have been moved up into "Under Review" to allow them to quickly and properly manage them based on their processes. Should help reduce training/tribal knowledge needs and improve overall outcomes.

formulas.name: formReferOutMissingFields
formulas.expression: IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.Campaign__c}), 'Campaign field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__First_Name__c}), 'Client First Name field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Last_Name__c}), 'Client Last Name field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Email__c}), 'Client Email field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.litify_pm__Client__r.litify_pm__Phone_Mobile__c}), 'Client Mobile Phone field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK({!Get_Intake.Retainer_AgreementSigned__c}), 'Retainer Agreement Signed Date field is blank' & BR(), '') & IF(ISBLANK(TEXT({!Get_Intake.Calling_on_behalf_of_you_or_loved_one__c})), 'Calling on behalf of you or loved one field is blank' & BR(), '')

Flow.interviewLabel: SRLG | Intake | QC | Managed Workflow Processes {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: SRLG | Intake | QC | Managed Workflow Processes

recordUpdates.name: Update_QC_User_Info_on_Intake
recordUpdates.label: Update QC User Info on Intake

fields.name: Success_notice_assignee
fields.fieldText:
You have been successfully assigned the record

Sub-status is now "Active Review"


This should now show up in your personal queue

fields.name: Extra_Referral_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: A Referral Packet already exists, please choose if you would like to generate a new one or not.

fields.name: Generate_Another_Referral_packet
fields.fieldText: Would you like to generate another Referral Packet?

fields.name: Areas_Errors_Need_to_be_Addressed
fields.fieldText: Areas Where Errors Exist (Select all that Apply)
fields.helpText: Select every option that applies to where errors need to be fixed.

fields.name: Define_Errors_on_Intake
fields.fieldText: Define Errors on Intake (Select all that Apply)

fields.name: Successful_Generation_Display_Text
fields.fieldText:
Your referral packet was successfully generated.

Click 'Send Referral' to send it out to our partners.

fields.name: Did_this_Intake_meet_Case_Qualifying_Criteria_CQC
fields.fieldText: Did this Intake meet Case Qualifying Criteria (CQC)?

fields.name: NoteInformation
fields.fieldText:
This Creates a Detailed Note that will show up in emails sent out to vendors and in the Note Section on the Intake for Intake Agents to use to solve the errors.ï»¿

Example:

Missing Answers:

-Diagnosis is missing

-Age of Mother is missing


Conflicting Answers:

-Age of father does not match birth of child

fields.name: Error_On_File_Notes
fields.fieldText: Error On File Notes (Write details under each problem selected)

fields.name: ReferralCheck_DisplayText
fields.fieldText:
You are not ready for a referall just yet.

Please return to select from other options

Or

Review missing items and come back when ready.

fields.name: displayReferOutError
fields.fieldText:
To refer out this intake the following fields must have a value

{!formReferOutMissingFields}

fields.name: ReferredOut_SuccessNotice
fields.fieldText: Your Intake has been successfully referred out!

fields.name: Success_notice
fields.fieldText:
Error on File Note has been created


Your Intake has been successfully updated

screens.description: Use for routing and determine what type of error they are facing.
screens.name: Type_of_Error
screens.label: Type of Error

fields.name: What_type_of_Error_is_this
fields.fieldText: What type of Error is this?

fields.name: Turn_Back_Notice
fields.fieldText: This choice of update can only occur if the intake has not been referred out

screens.description: Decides what update will occur for QC to select from.
screens.name: Update_to_Perform
screens.label: Update to Perform

fields.name: How_would_you_like_to_update_this_Intake_today
fields.fieldText: How would you like to update this Intake today?

fields.name: UpdateStatus_SuccessNotice
fields.fieldText: You have successfully updated the Status of the Intake!

subflows.description: Uses Brio's send referral open matter flow to continue the work.

subflows.description: Used to turn down the record or just update the status as needed.
